DOC.brief_summary: This study assessed the Hr QoL (Health related Quality of life) of subjects with mild to moderate AD, who received ARICEPT under usual clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Quality Of Life Assessment In Alzheimer's Disease (AD) Patients Receiving Aricept Tablets
DOC.detailed_description: This non-interventional study enrolled patients with mild to moderate dementia of the Alzheimer's type, who have been prescribed treatment with ARICEPT under usual clinical practice.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Alzheimer's Disease There are no exclusion criteria
